name: Kingdom of Bees
description:
"Kingdom of Bees" is a game where you try to create a kingdom of bees. You must defend your hive from enemies, develop it and eventually collect an army of bees and destroy the enemy lair. Be careful from time to time you may be visited by uninvited guests, which can create many problems for you.
  • Expand your hive.
  • Increase the number of bees and strengthen them.
  • Beware of enemies.
  • Explore the world.
  • And most importantly, enjoy the game.
